byline.original: By REGINA E. HERZLINGER, BARAK D. RICHMAN and RICHARD J. BOXER

abstract: Op-Ed article by Profs Regina E Herzlinger, Barak D Richman and Richard J Boxer underscores degree to which American workers' take-home pay has stagnated due to unsustainable increases in health care costs; proposes tweak to tax code that would increase consumer choice, drive down health care premium costs and give workers more personal control about their insurance decisions, which would also address many concerns raised during election season.
